<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>AddWatchList</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	if (current.requested_for.manager) {
		var ma = current.requested_for.manager;
		current.watch_list += ',' + ma.sys_id;
		current.update();
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-06-09 13:41:45</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cdb20691838eea10f980f1d6feaad3b4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AddWatchList</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Demo3-PDF Generate PDF & Field Update" source="x_1642217_demo3_1">8a3e77bf83316610f980f1d6feaad374</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Demo3-PDF Generate PDF & Field Update">8a3e77bf83316610f980f1d6feaad374</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_cdb20691838eea10f980f1d6feaad3b4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-06-09 13:41:45</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=cdb20691838eea10f980f1d6feaad3b4"/></record_update>
